course_title: Special Topics: Political Science: Jihadist Movements & Politics
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 15 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same as MESAS 370 3)
(Complete Topic - Jihadist Movements & the Politics of Terror in the Middle East)
(This course aims to introduce students to conceptions of jihad as articulated throughout Islamic history. It will then focus on three primary case studies of militant Islamist movements in the 21st century: the Taliban, Al Qaeda, and the Islamic State.)
course_description: Selected topics and problems in political science. Content will vary in successive offerings of this course. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
